amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funding for further production of the Trident II (D-5) missile; and would have provided funding only for the completion of production of those missiles commenced before FY 1998.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to terminate production of the Trident D-5 submarine-launched ballistic missile (SLBM).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Luther amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 145 - 253 (Roll no. 221).
